name: uieSlider

description.text: Each uieSlider instance will behave to give the user a useful graphic interface for changing numeric value.

options: A collection of properties for customize the layout and behavior of each slider.

properties.text: You can pass some (or all) of these properties within an object inside constructor.

extension: Css extension object for customizable element.
callback: Callback method triggered when slider's value change.
stepValue: The step value during handler drag operation.
initialValue: The initial value of the slider (should be between minValue and maxValue).

sliderValue(): Returns the slider instance's current numeric value.
sliderPercentage(): Returns the slider instance's current percentage value.
